Posts.Content: Hi Linda, I'm on my first week of taxol. I cant really tell if it affecting my heart rate or not. I just have no engery and hurt all the time. Sorry that i couldnt be of any more help. Good Luck with taxol and congrats on finishing a/c! Julie
Posts.Title: Anybody else get racy after a/c treatments

Posts.Content: Good Luck to everyone who has doc appoints, chemo, rads, or any other issues today! All will go well! Julie
